If not found: returns BOOL: TRUE or FALSE, and position in REF INT pos.

Languages: C, C++ (char * only, returns pointer to first character)

Format: string indexOfSubCollection: substring startingAt: startpos ifAbsent: aBlock string findString: substring startingAt: startpos
If not found: evaluate aBlock which is a block closure (or any object understanding value) returns 0
returns 0 if substring is not in string; returns LEN(string)+1 if substring is empty
returns 0 if occurrence of substring is not in string; (positions start at 1)
returns 1 + the last position in string
